title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 503.7 - Participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 503.7 - Participation

State Regulations

Only parties to a proceeding will be allowed to participate
and be entitled to be served with copies of orders and notices and
reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
503.7

Renumbered from 503.8

New

York State Register March 5, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 09, eff. 3/5/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
